sent.orig: Horizontal and vertical boiler boiler is the invention of the Europeans, squatting boiler is my invention.
sent.trans: 立式汽锅和卧式汽锅是欧洲人创造，蹲式汽锅是本人创造。

sent.orig: The boiler of supercritical coal fired generating unit-through boiler, and its dynamic response is complex.
sent.trans: 超临界燃煤发电机组配置的直流锅炉，动态特性复杂。

sent.orig: High-pressure boiler tubes are a kind of boiler tubes, seamless steel tubes belong to the categories.
sent.trans: 高压锅炉管是锅炉管的一种，属于无缝钢管类别。

sent.orig: Boiler level is the sign of the boiler level balance, so level control is very important.
sent.trans: 锅炉汽包水位是衡量锅炉汽水系统物质是否平衡的标志，因此水位控制十分重要。

sent.orig: Compared with pressure boiler, normal pressure hot-water boiler is a kind of safer heat source.
sent.trans: 常压热水锅炉相对于承压锅炉是一种安全的供热源。
